author: neilg
msg: localize some exception message produced by our custom reader classes.

author: sandygao
msg: A line was removed by accident. I'm adding it back.
we don't need to do strick checking when creating a DOM tree from
the parser, because such checking is already perfomed by the parser.

author: sandygao
msg: Update the dom parser: when the document class is set to the PSVI document
class, the parser stores PSVI properties in elements/attributes of such

author: sandygao
msg: Add a new kind of DOM document implmentation, which supports PSVI.
When this kind of document is used, element/attribute nodes can be casted
to Element/AttributePSVI interfaces to retrieve PSVI properties.

author: neilg
msg: splitting messages specific to the DOM into a separate file from those used by the serializer.
